Name: Chainmail Bikini
About the game: Chainmail Bikini is an RPG game, built in RPG Maker MV, that follows the adventures of a hero named Brandi the Red and her companions as they hunt monsters for fun and profit. It is designed to offer a fun and quick RPG experience, suitable for the casual player or for any RPG fan. This game includes 4 playable characters, uses keyboard controls, currently holds 4 playable quests and dozens of monsters to fight in turn-based combat. Future updates will expand the number of playable quests, monsters, and NPCs in the game.
